inn1.comm: tossed up ball on the middle stump, blocks to leg side
touch short on middle stump, turns to square leg
flatter length ball on middle and leg, dabs it down
this one came in with the angle and moves across beating the outside edge
shortish and outside off, cut and a miss
appeal, full length ball on the leg stump. Morea tries to defend on the front foot, beats the bat and hits the pad. Heading down leg
back of a length on middle stump, pushes to leg side
back of a length and down leg, kisses the pad and beats the keeper
full length and pushes down the leg side, another extra
length ball straying on the pads, clips it to deep fine leg
good length ball and outside off, Morea defends off the front foot
full length on off stump, pats back to the bowler
full and wide outside off, free his arms and slashes that through cover point for a boundary
length ball outside off, Ura stays in the crease and steers that to wide of backward point
huge appeal for lbw, tossed up from round the wicket, clips the pad but that's going down leg
steps out and pushes this full ball into covers
short of a length and outside off, cuts it straight to backward point
full length ball on middle stump, gets an inside edge towards backward of square leg
flatter length ball outside off, leans onto it and drives to mid-off
touch short at off stump, pushes into cover point off the back foot
shortish once again, this time a bit of inward movement. Morea dabs it down towards backward point
back of a length and down leg, keeper can't collect it too
good length ball on middle and leg, works it with the angle past square leg
short and width offered, Morea cuts it off the back foot and gets that to the right of third man
good length ball on off stump, presents the full face of the bat as he blocks
pitched up ball outside off, drives it off the front foot but not able to timed it well, went to mid-off
length ball on middle stump, gets across the stumps as he defends
short and spun back in sharply, hits the back pad. Huge appeal turned down, a bit high
clips it through square leg
Morea skips down the track and Ahmed drags that short, taps to off side
full length ball, pushes to shortish midwicket
shortish and outside off, Morea opens the bat face late and runs that to wide of backward point
short of a length and straightens outside off, cuts it hard past point for another boundary
good length ball, edges it towards point
length ball outside off, driven off the front foot to mid-off
stays deep inside the crease and clips this length ball behind square leg for a couple
back of a length outside off stump, Ura punches into cover region
good length ball on middle stump, defends to off side
quicker length ball outside off, beats the outside edge as Morea pushes at it
full length at leg stump, keep it down to leg side with soft hands
tossed up ball on middle stump, leans forward and defends
back of a length on middle stump, tucks to shortish midwicket region
fuller length ball on middle stump, driven straight to mid-on
keeps the full length, this one angling in. Ura flicks it to wide of midwicket
touch short on middle and leg stump, edges to off side
half-volley outside off, Morea leans onto it and lofted that over the mid-off region
good length delivery outside off, a solid defence into covers
short and turns across, cut and a miss outside off
flighted ball outside off, driven uppishly over the covers
shortish and this one spun back in, play and a miss
tossed up ball outside off, gets the bat pad together as he pushes to cover
Ura sweeps that down to deep midwicket for a single
pushes slower through air and outside off, Morea drives off the front foot but picks the cover fielder
touch short and moves away from outside off, left alone
back of a length and this one shapes back in, Ura dabs it to short midwicket
short of a length around off stump, punches off the back foot to mid-off
length ball straying down leg side, clips the pad as they ran across for a leg bye
full length and pushed down the leg side, called wide
length ball on middle and leg, nudges to short midwicket
slightly short on middle stump, onto his toes as he kept it down towards short midwicket
tossed up ball, well outside off, driven into cover region off the front foot
kept low and touch short on off stump, defended by Ura
full and wide outside off, slower too. Ura can't connect
Ura took this on the full, driven hard but picks the fielder at short cover
length ball outside off, driven straight past the bowler
waits for this slower ball and pushes it between cover and point for a single
back of a length around the pads, works it to long leg for a single
short of a length on middle stump. Morea was a bit early to go for the pull shot, gets a top edge which flies over the keeper's head
Morea flicks that behind square leg for a couple
touch short on middle stump, punches to on side
full length ball on middle stump, tuns it to square leg
short and outside off, an outside edge to an attempted cut down to third man
came down the track and clips this short ball to midwicket
short ball outside off, cuts it nicely but point fielder ran across and fields
full length ball, pushes straight back to the bowler
works with soft hands, this time to the left of the bowler
shortish ball down leg, goes back and swept hard to backward square leg
Morea punches this down to sweeper for a single
back of a length around middle and off, stands tall and pushes towards backward point
short of a length and outside off, taps into point off the back foot
shortish ball just outside off, waits for it and guides that to wide of third man
touch short on middle stump, punches to leg side
length ball on middle and leg, clips to short midwicket
straying on the pads, this was on a length as Morea flicks that behind square leg
flighted ball on middle stump, drills it down to long-on
tossed up ball on middle and off, driven hard back to the bowler
flatter length ball outside off, Siaka bends down touch and lofts that over the mid-off region
length ball on middle stump, defends off the front foot
short of a length ball outside off, cuts it off the back foot but can't beat the cover fielder
way slower through air and shortish, Siaka lets it go through
flatter length ball around off stump, gets forward as he blocks it
tossed up ball on leg stump, pushes straight back to the bowler
short and turning across, edges it towards the slip cordon
tossed up on middle and leg, defends off the front foot
length ball on leg stump, pushes to the right of the bowler
Morea leans onto it and taps this length ball into cover
tossed up from round the wicket, strides out and blocks

Rath gets his first wicket, this was tossed up outside off from round the wicket, this ball kept straight. Siaka gets down and tries to slog across the line. He ends up skying it towards the cover region off the top edge, Hayat back tracks and collects it.
tossed up ball outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
full and wide across, pats back to the bowler
flatter length ball on leg stump, gets a leading edge as he tries to clip through square leg
touch short as he punches that down to long-on for a single
tossed up ball on leg stump, from round the wicket, pushes back to the bowler

and skipper departs, Ehsan gets a big wicket here. He continues to bowl from round the wicket. It was a flatter length ball on middle stump and this ball straightens. Vala tries to defend but ball went past the bat and hit the pad, plumb infront.
tuns this length ball with the angle towards square leg for a  quick single
pushes this full ball to leg side
touch short around off, dabs to leg side
Morea gets forward and blocks with soft hands
pushes full and wide across, beaten outside off
comes down the track and coverts this to a full toss, clips down to deep square leg
skips down the track and taps this infront of cover for a quick single
Morea flicks that straight to short midwicket

Morea once again dances down the track and tries to attack. Rath saw him coming and pushes this quicker and follows his legs. Morea plays across the line and ball turns away too after pitching around the leg stump, through the bat pad gap and shatters the stumps..
flighted ball on middle and off, defended
length ball on off stump, gets forward and dead bats it
pushes off the front foot in backward of point
shortish length and coming in with the angle, punches into short cover
once again short and outside off, cuts it to point off the back foot
flatter length ball on middle stump, defends
clips to the right off the bowler
short and outside off, gets an outside edge to wide of short third man
tossed up ball outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
tossed up ball on middle stump, pushes back to the bowler
gets bat pad together as he blocks down the pitch
floated outside off, driven towards the cover region
tossed up outside off, driven to widish long-off
short and coming in with the angle, punches into cover
tossed up ball outside off, Bau comes down the track and lofted that nicely over the long-off region
short and wide outside off, cuts it down to sweeper
quicker and touch shorter, punches into point off the back foot
full length ball on middle stump, driven straight back to the bowler
length ball straying on the pads, works it with the angle through backward square leg
short of a length on off stump, waits and glides to wide of short third man
slower length ball outside off, pushes into point
full and widish , slams away to the cover fence
full and too wide outside off, Bau stretches out and slices that past backward of point
length ball outside off, plays away from the body as he drives, catches the outside edge. Ball hits the leg of the keeper and ran past the slip cordon
short ball on middle stump, turns it to square leg off the back foot
pushes full and quicker outside off, beaten as he pokes at it
length ball around off stump, inside edge towards the short fine leg region
Bau presents a defence off the full face
once again negotiates this safely by Bau
touch short, punches into midwicket region off the back foot
length ball drifting on the pads, tucks it nicely to fine leg fence
driven uppishly down to long-on for a single
short and outside off, runs it down to third man with an open face
length ball on middle stump, tucks it behind square leg
punches this down to long-on
flatter length ball outside off, strides out and blocks it
once again nicely gets behind the line as he defends
tossed up outside off, drives off the front foot to extra cover
full ball on middle stump, driven to the left of the bowler
short and bit of inward movement, dabs it down
tossed up on the leg stump, clips it towards the square leg region
full length ball on middle and leg, defends to leg side
tossed up down the leg side
backs away and driven into covers
short ball around off stump, taps into backward point
full ball at the legs, drills it to long-on
Bau pushes this down the ground and gets a single
nicely forward and blocks to cover
short and turning away, goes back and punches into cover
Bau comes down the track and reaches to the pitch of it, lifts that high over the mid-on region
short on middle stump, tucks to the right of square leg
on a length outside off, pokes at it and is beaten
pitched up ball, driven into cover region for a single
flatter length ball outside off, kept it down with soft hands
flighted ball around middle and leg, clips it behind square leg
touch short as he punches back towards the bowler

and Nadeem breaks the partnership. He comes round the wicket and bowls a flighted one around middle and leg. This ball held the deck and grips. Dogodo was early onto his shot as he tries to flick that through the leg side, gets a leading edge which lobs back to the bowler.
gets forward and blocks it
once again onto the front foot and defends down the pitch.
full and slower, clips to leg side
driven on the rise but can't beat the cover fielder
tossed up outside off, drives off the front foot to widish long-off
turning in from a length, flicks to midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, driven straight to shortish midwicket
length ball around the pads, clips it with the angle to wide of deep midwicket
short and outside off, cuts it down to deep point off the back foot
length ball on middle and off, pats back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, drives it along the carpet down to long-off
gets down on one knee and paddle sweeps this flatter length ball down to fine leg fence
tossed up on middle stump, turns it between square leg and midwicket
full and straightens outside off, punches into short midwicket
over-steps, comes down the pitch as he mistimes the drive..
mistimes the slog to leg side and gets an single
comes down the track and slices that over the backward of point and gets a boundary
short and outside off, waits and a late dab to short third man
prods forward and blocks this length ball into covers
pitched up, drives it down to long-off
short and turning down leg, goes back and pulls it to deep square leg
floated outside off, driven into extra cover
shortish outside off, punches through cover
length ball on the pads, blocks to leg side
flighted ball outside off, slower through air. Driven into covers off the front foot
short and turning in, works into short midwicket

Rath gets his third wicket, this was on a flatter length which was pitched outside off and sliding in with the angle. Bau gets half forward and tries to drive, playing inside the line. Ball went past the outside edge and hits the back pad.
tossed up on middle stump, defends it off the front foot
tossed up outside off, driven into covers
slower and full outside off, turns to short midwicket
Dai gets a leading edge but fall short of the bowler
fraction short and outside off, punches through cover
clips that between square leg and midwicket
flighted ball outside off, driven into shortish cover
full toss outside off, reverse sweeps to wide of short third man
length ball which strikes the pad as Dai misses out the fence, impact outside off
short and turning in, goes back and pulls down to deep square leg
yorker on middle stump, dug out safely
short and quicker, defends off the back foot
works it with the angle behind square leg for a single
tossed up outside off, driven through covers for a single
short and slower on off, punches to cover
length ball on middle stump, clips to short midwicket
once again can't beat the man at shortish midwicket
on a length and outside off, pushes into cover point
gets forward and defends to off side
full and kept low outside off, Dai misses out the reverse sweep and even keeper can't collect it
length ball outside off, strides out and blocks it
tossed up delivery and was outside off, pushes to the left of Ehsan
floated up wide outside off, gets the bat pad together to block
short and down leg, pulls down to long leg for a single
tossed up ball from Ehsan, Soper dabs it off the front foot
full toss on middle stump, punches to long-on
short and turning in touch from outside off, Soper had ample of time to go back as he cuts it to point fence
length ball straying on the pads, clips it infront of square leg
tossed up outside off, drills to long-on
full ball, works it down to long-on once again for a single
short of a length outside off, punches off the back foot between cover and point
slower length ball outside off, Dai gets an outside edge which fall short of point
length ball on middle and leg, nudges to square leg for a quick single
back of a length on the leg stump, waits and works it to wide of midwicket
over-steps, shortish length, pulls it behind square leg
full and slower one, but way widish
another slower ball, pushes full and outside off, beats the batsman as well as the keeper
back of a length outside off, punches to wide of backward point
full toss over waist-height, works it down to deep square leg
gets down and mistimes the ramp to wide of fine leg
driven down to sweeper for a single
short and outside off, works it to wide of backward point
tossed up on leg stump, works that to wide of long-on
full ball at off stump, clips to short midwicket
fraction short on the leg stump, turns to square leg
Dai mistimes the reverse sweep into cover region
short and outside off, cuts it off the back foot to deep point
tossed up at middle and off, works to short third man
flatter length ball on middle stump, defends
tossed up on the legs, works it with the angle to wide of midwicket
over-steps, short and quicker through air, Soper can't connect
another short ball, cuts it to wide of deep point for a couple
tossed up on middle, leading edge fall short of cover
slower and on a length outside off, gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps that to wide of deep midwicket
quite fullish at off stump, turns it behind square leg for a single
drags this length ball down to long-on
flatter length ball around middle and off, kept out safely
shortish and outside off, punches into cover
short of a length, Dai chopped that to shortish third man
goes back and works to wide of backward point
quicker ball at middle stump, tucks it through square leg
comes out and coverts it to a full toss, punches down to long-on
another full toss, this time he drags that from outside off, fall short of long-on
quicker and shortish outside off, defends
outside edge to an attempted punch, went to short third man
Dai dances down the track and took it on the full, gets an outside edge which files to wide of third man
back of a length down leg, clips the thigh pad

back of a length and outside off. Soper was standing outside the leg stump and tries to cut it. Edges it back to the keeper. There was no real attempt from him to get closer to the line, plays away from the body and paid the price. Also this ball bounces touch extra with good pace.
full toss outside off, drives off the front foot to short cover
another full toss, this time down leg, clips the pad and rolls towards the keeper
yorker on middle and leg, Hiri somehow kept it out safely down the pitch
gets down on one knee and across to sweep, wears it on the pad. Appeal turned down, impact outside off
Dai skips out and smashes that over wide of long-on
punches this short ball into cover point
fraction short on middle stump, tuns it between square leg and midwicket
short and way outside off, tries to cut and is beaten
this time around off stump but still on shortish length, once again Hiri can't connect
comes down the track and pulls this short ball to deep square leg fence, fifty for Dai
full length on leg stump, digs it out to leg side
full toss outside off, wears it on the pad as he tries to ramp it over the keeper's head
full toss outside off, backs away and slashes into the cover region
low full toss down leg, can't pull out the yorker, helped away through square leg
full toss on the middle stump, finally Dai able to gets his ramp shot right, went up and over fine leg fence
Hiri drags that short ball down to long-on
length ball on leg stump, backs away and slams it over the long-on fielder
once again backs away and makes room. Full ball on middle stumps, lifts it over the bowler's head
this ball came in with the angle, and moves across. Beats the swing of Dai
short ball on middle stump, chopped into covers
slower length ball down leg, Dai wears it on the pad as he tries for a reverse-sweep
short and slower outside off, Hiri is beaten by the lack of pace
yorker down leg, edges it back towards the keeper
short, slower and widish, Dai reaches out for it and slashes through point
full and slowish outside off, Dai reads it well and lofts it over the extra cover region by moving across
yorker length outside off, digs it out back towards the bowler
Dai comes down the track and Aizaz follows him, but ended up with a full toss. Dai flicks it to square leg fence

inn2.comm: tight line on off stump, defends off the front foot
fuller length ball, pushes to mid-on
that's on a widish length, Carter reaches out for it. He gets an inside edge which went back past the keeper
shortish ball outside off, punches through point for a single
full and down the leg side, clips the pad for a leg bye
fraction short at off stump, Carter blocks it to off side
sliding in from round the wicket, clips Shah's pad, heading down leg
touch short, punches back to the bowler
angling down leg, works it to backward of square leg
flatter length ball outside off, punches into short cover
shortish and kept straight outside off, Carter pats back towards the bowler
fractionally short, Carter punches into cover point, can't beat the fielder
full length ball on middle and leg, leading edge over the mid-off as Shah tries to flick
length ball outside off, steps out and lofts that to wide of extra cover
Carter clips it to mid-on
back of a length angling in, flicks it straight to midwicket
good length outside off, strides out and defends into cover
Soper strikes, early wicket for
full length ball at leg stump, pushes into cover point
length ball outside off, stretches out and blocks
once again gets bat pad forward and defends
on a length outside off, pushes into cover point
shortish on middle and leg, clips it infront of square leg for a quick single
and that's gone..Dai now shines with the ball. He comes round the wicket and bowls a flatter length ball on middle and leg, this ball turns across touch as Shah was caught playing a straighter line.
length ball slipped down leg side
short and moving across, gets behind the line to block
Nizakat clips to leg side off the back foot
tossed up delivery outside off, driven uppishly to mid-off
Hayat walks across for a single
flighted delivery outside off, driven down to long-off
comes out and dabs to leg side
gets the bat pad together to block
Hayat skips out and pushes it to the left of diving bowler
length ball on middle stump, defends off the front foot
quite fullish, pats back to the bowler
moves across to this short ball as he defends off the back foot
tossed up ball outside off, Nizakat mis-hits it over the long-off, short boundary and mid-off was up too. He gathers the weight on the back and tries to clear the long-on region
drags the length shortish outside off, punches off the back foot
works it down to long-off for a single
shortish and kept low, works it back towards the bowler
short of a length on middle stump, punches off the back foot down to long-on
Hayat chopped that infront of cover point
drills that down to long-on
on a length but slipped down the leg side
and now Nizakat holes out, tossed up delivery on middle stump. Nizakat gets down on one knee as he tries for a slog sweep. He ends up skying that down towards long-off. Bau held it comfortably.
full length at leg stump, works it to the left of Siaka
short and straightens on off, pulls down to deep midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, clips to square leg
flatter and on a length outside off, defends off the front foot
full at off stump, drills it to long-on for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, works out safely down the track
quicker and on a length outside off, beaten
pushes to the left of the bowler
comes out and makes it a full toss, sends it down to long-on for a single
shortish length on the stumps, kept out to short midwicket
shortish once again, turns to the fielder at short midwicket
another short of a length ball, finally he able to get it past the man at short midwicket, only a single
keeps the same shortish length, works it down to long leg
Rath gets down on one knee and swept it nicely past the shortish fine leg for a boundary
shortish and moving across, works to leg side
tossed up on off stump, turns it to square leg
comes out and works it back to the bowler
floated up outside off, this time driven to the left of Dai
Hayat dances down the track and digs it out to on side
full and pushes wide across from round the wicket, leans forward and driven through the gap at cover region
short and slower ball outside off, Rath goes back and pulls it to wide of deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
full toss outside off, pushes into extra cover
fraction short at off stump, presents the full face as he defends
Hayat charges down the track and swung this full toss over the square leg region
tossed up ball outside off, driven up and over the cover region, another boundary for Hayat
length ball on middle and leg, Rath defends
tossed up on leg stump, driven along the ground to long-on
touch short on the pads, clips to square leg
short and kept low down leg, Hayat gets down on one knee and swept to wide of fine leg
skips out this time and makes it a full toss, works down to long-on
angling onto the pads, tucks it behind square leg for a single
tossed up ball around off stump, prods forward to block
clips the pad down leg as Rath misses out the sweep shot
short and outside off, punches through the diving cover fielder
full toss outside off, drills it to long-off
short of a length on off stump, punches nicely off the back foot to sweeper
short ball on middle stump, goes back and punches straight into covers
tossed up down the leg side, powers it down to long-on
comes out and drives it down to long-off for a single
full toss on middle stump, Rath punches down to long-off
Hayat skips out and pats it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery around off stump, Hayat charges down the track and was inside the line. Slogs it nicely well and over the deep midwicket fence
short  ball outside off, punches into short cover
tossed ball outside off, leans forward an dabs it down the track
shortish and sliding in, goes back and punches down the ground
punches into cover region off the back foot, this was angling across from a length
short once again, punches into cover
cuts this short ball straight into backward of point
fullish length around middle and off, pushes with soft hands for a quick single
length ball on middle and leg, clips into shortish midwicket
full on the leg, flicks it through midwicket for a single
length ball and outside off, pushes it past mid-off
yorker on middle stump, dug out
pushes to mid-off
tossed up delivery outside off, defends
Rath works it down to long-off
tossed up down leg, gets down on one knee and swept it past backward square leg
clips this length ball through square leg
legsidish length ball, works it past the keeper for a couple
driven on the rise but can't evade the mid-off
back of a length outside off, punches into cover off the back foot
length ball outside off, leans onto it and lofted it over the long-off region
on a length and outside off, driven off the front foot
full length ball outside off, reaches out and driven through the diving extra cover region
short ball, pulls it down to deep square leg for a couple
length ball straying on the pads, clips it past backward square leg
full and slower on leg stump, driven down to long-on
full length ball on the stumps, pats back to the bowler
once again drives it back past the keeper
a late dab down to third man for a single
goes back and works it to the leg side off the back foot
full length around the leg, tucks it to shortish fine leg
Rath gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
goes back and punches this short ball towards mid-on
tossed up delivery on off, works it down to long-on for a single
tossed up on the leg stump, clips it to short midwicket
short and outside off, not much width offered but Rath is so brilliant that he waits for it and squeezes it past backward of point
length ball on the pads, tucks to leg side
good length ball moving across from middle stump, drills it down to long-on
short of a length, punches into the cover off the back foot
Hayat drives it along the ground to long-off
length ball on the legs, clips it past backward of square leg
pushes quick er and on a length outside off, beats the outside off
on a length outside off, drops it infront of cover point with soft hands
comes down the track and mistimes the slog down towards the deep midwicket
shortish and straightens outside off, works it towards the bowler
on the leg, whipped it nicely through square leg for a single
flatter length ball on off stump, punches it to long
good length ball at off stump, defends with a straight bat face
fullish delivery outside off, strides out and drives to long-off
back of a length on the pads, tucks it to long leg
and rain is getting heavier now..Hayat gets a boundary in the meantime, on a length and straying on the pads, clips it past backward square leg
short of a good length around off, punches down to mid-on
length ball and a bit of inward movement, Babar smashes that straight over the mid-on region
short of a length outside off, punches into cover point
touch short at off stump, slogs across the line, only an inside edge to the pad
on a length but way outside off
that's it, Rath gets to his fifty too with this boundary, fuller length around off as he slogs it through midwicket
